MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL55 postcode area of Caernarfon affecting properties in Erw Nant Estate and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:52am. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:56am on the 3rd December 2020.
